hero.subtitle: Create your culinary library, manage ingredients, discover new recipes, and share your culinary discoveries with the community. Everything you need to organize your kitchen in one place.

recipes.additional_info: Create, save, and share your culinary creations. Add step-by-step instructions, photos, and detailed descriptions of each dish.

ingredients.additional_info: Keep track of all products in your kitchen: monitor expiration dates, prices, and quantities. Automatically generate shopping lists for new recipes.

market.additional_info: Discover unique recipes from home cooks. Buy proven recipes with detailed instructions or sell your own creations.

settings.additional_info: Customize the app to your preferences: choose a theme, interface language, configure notifications, and manage your profile.

recipe_organization.title: Recipe Organization
recipe_organization.description: Store all your favorite recipes in one place with convenient search and filtering. Create collections, add tags and categories for quick access to the dishes you need.

ingredient_management.title: Ingredient Management
ingredient_management.description: Track product availability in your kitchen and plan purchases in advance. Keep records of expiration dates, prices, and quantities for optimal purchase planning.

community.title: Chef Community
community.description: Buy and sell recipes in the marketplace of home authors. Share experiences, find inspiration, and monetize your culinary talents.

how_it_works.title: How It Works
how_it_works.subtitle: Choose your path: sell recipes or buy and cook

selling.title: Selling Path
selling.description: Create ingredients, develop recipes, and sell them through your own store

create_ingredients.title: Create Ingredients
create_ingredients.description: Add all necessary products to your ingredient catalog. Specify prices, units of measurement, and categories for easy organization.

create_recipes.title: Create Recipes
create_recipes.description: Using your ingredients, create detailed recipes with step-by-step instructions, photos, and detailed descriptions of each cooking stage.

publish_recipes.title: Publish Recipes for Sale
publish_recipes.description: Select recipes you want to sell, set prices, and publish them in your catalog. Add attractive descriptions and photos.

create_market.title: Create a Store
create_market.description: Set up your store on the Kitchen Helper marketplace. Add information about yourself, specify your store's theme, and start selling your culinary creations.

buying.title: Buying Path
buying.description: Find unique recipes, cook with them, and share experiences with the community

buy_recipes.title: Buy Recipes
buy_recipes.description: Browse the recipe catalog on the marketplace, read descriptions and reviews from other users. Choose proven recipes from experienced chefs and purchase the ones you like.

cook_recipe.title: Cook the Recipe
cook_recipe.description: Follow the detailed step-by-step instructions from the purchased recipe. Use photos as visual guides and create your culinary masterpieces.

communicate.title: Communicate and Share Experience
communicate.description: Chat with recipe authors, ask questions in chat, share your impressions and photos of finished dishes. Build a culinary community.

create_collections.title: Create Collections
create_collections.description: Save your favorite recipes to your collections, organize them by categories and themes. Build your personal culinary library from the best recipes.

use_cases.title: Who is Kitchen Helper For?
use_cases.subtitle: Our app is suitable for different types of users

beginners.title: For Beginners
beginners.description: Learn new recipes, learn to cook with step-by-step instructions and photos. Keep your culinary diary.

experienced.title: For Experienced Chefs
experienced.description: Organize your recipe collection, share experiences with the community, and monetize your culinary skills.

vegans.title: For Vegans
vegans.description: Find special recipes, manage plant-based ingredients, and share your discoveries.

families.title: For Families
families.description: Plan family meals, track products, and create favorite recipes that can be passed down to children.

business.title: For Business
business.description: Restaurateurs and cafes can use the app to manage recipes, ingredients, and purchases.

students.title: For Students
students.description: A simple way to track products, save on food, and cook delicious meals on a limited budget.

cta.title: Ready to Start?
cta.description: Join the Kitchen Helper community and discover a new level of kitchen organization
